item.description:
We've got a new spot for the Rhode Island Oath Keeper's meetings!

"Nikki's Grill and Chill" 307 Great Island Road, Narragansett, RI 02882

This is in Galilee right across from the Block Island ferry.

We will have access to the whole place, bar, restaurant, lounge by the pool or large conference room.

Meetings will be held on the first and third Tuesdays of every month at 7 p.m.


Please join us, bring a friend and your ideas for "Reach Teach and Inspire".


AND LIBERTY FOR ALL!


Randy Swanson

401-952-5015


Feel free to show up on unscheduled Tuesdays because the owner is a great patriot that can use our support and some of us just can't get enough of that patriotic camaraderie.
item.name: Rhode Island Oath Keeper's meeting
